com.microsoft.applicationinsights.channel

Class TelemetryContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.applicationinsights.channel.TelemetryContext

  • public class TelemetryContext
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is holding all telemetryContext information.

      • renewSessionId

        public static void renewSessionId()
        Renews the session context The session ID is on demand. Additionally, the isFirst flag is set if no data was found in settings and the isNew flag is set each time a new UUID is generated.
